page.title: 19NEWTONMORE CAMANACHD 4
page.content: Two men in the close up photograph with the cups won in 1984/85 are the Captain of the first team:{John D. {Russell}who was lucky enough during this season to be the Captain and who collected the four black and silver mounted presentation camans ( shinty sticks ), a highly prized and coveted personal trophy. His father is with him in the picture. He is the club{President}and happens to be the well known{Regional {Councillor and Chairman of the {Regional Education Committee - {Alexander J. Russell.}He is probably the best known local personality. He owns the local coal merchants business and is well known as a former shinty player and highly skilled curler. He serves on a great number of National Committees and appears frequently on radio and television.
